div.div: Beloit College vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: Beloit wins toss and defers. St. Norbert receives in south end zone.
Kam Sallee kickoff 64 yards to the SNC01, Keenan Dowd return 22 yards to the SNC23 (David Lafayette).
St. Norbert College drive start at 15:00.
Zach Broberg rush for 7 yards to the SNC30 (Jake Fisher).
Zach Reeves rush for 8 yards to the SNC38 (Juan Guerrero).
